title: Magnetic flux - through a square plate

content.prompt: A square plate is placed in a constant magnetic field where the area vector is at an angle 45Â° to the magnetic field. As the square is rotated, how does the magnetic flux change?

choices.label: The magnetic flux increases or decreases in a linear manner.
The magnetic flux increases or decreases, but not linearly.
How the flux changes depends on the axis about which it is rotated.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
